ygData.subject: Re: Blacksmithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm, thanks for the info. I think it might be hard because I am in Neriak with my smith. I do not think there are any armor molds there, skewers are not
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm, thanks for the info. I think it might be hard because I am in Neriak
with my smith. I do not think there are any armor molds there, skewers are
not there either. I may just resort to making a new character in Freeport
area to get all the stuff I need, I hear that Freeport is home to 2 of the
banded making smiths on my server. What server your friend play? Thanks for
the info, hope to be able to make banded soon.
